steps.title: Marinate the chicken breast with salt, pepper, and mustard paste for 15 minutes.
steps.content: Marinate the chicken breast with salt, pepper, and mustard paste for 15 minutes.

steps.title: Add flour 3 tbsp heaped, 3 tbsp corn flour, 1/2 tsp baking powder, 1 beaten egg and some chilled water to make the batter.
steps.content: Add flour 3 tbsp heaped, 3 tbsp corn flour, 1/2 tsp baking powder, 1 beaten egg and some chilled water to make the batter.

steps.title: Dip the marinated chicken breast in the batter.
steps.content: Dip the marinated chicken breast in the batter.

steps.title: Roll it in dry flour.
steps.content: Roll it in dry flour. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Fry the chicken in a frying pan until crispy and golden in color.
steps.content: Fry the chicken in a frying pan until crispy and golden in color. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Cut the burger buns in half.
steps.content: Cut the burger buns in half.

steps.title: Apply mayonnaise and vinegar on the bun.
steps.content: Apply mayonnaise and vinegar on the bun.

steps.title: Top the burger with fried chicken.
steps.content: Top the burger with fried chicken.

steps.title: Put the salad leaves on top.
steps.content: Put the salad leaves on top.

steps.title: Cover the burger with the top part of the bun.
steps.content: Cover the burger with the top part of the bun.

steps.title: Serve immediately so the burger will still be hot.
steps.content: Serve immediately so the burger will still be hot. [3] X Research source
